titleStmt.title: The remonstrance of the Presbyterie of Sterling, against the present conjunction with the malignant party to the commission of the Kirk at St. Johnston.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. Presbytery of Stirling.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: David Bennet, moderator, John Graymeddell, James Guthrie [and 3 others]
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
